咖啡因和甜菜根汁在重复的高强度运行中击败疲劳咖啡因与甜菜根汁相结合可显着改善非运动员男性的初始和重复的1000米跑步性能。体内脂肪百分比，睡眠持续时间和营养作为影响耐力结果的关键因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250330/caffeine-and-beetroot-juice-juice-juice-beat-fatigue-in-repeated-in-repeated-high-inger-intmenty-runs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250330/caffeine-and-beetroot-juice-juice-juice-beat-fatigue-in-repeated-in-repeated-high-ingh-inger-intmenty-runs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41770467-7f24-4806-a45f-889054bd69ae Sun, 30 Mar 2025 21:29:00 -0400 Caffeine and beetroot juice beat fatigue in repeated high-intensity runs
享乐主义饮食肥胖的淡出 - 但神经素有助于将其带​​回慢性高脂饮食通过损害小鼠的NACLAT→VTA信号传导，大脑对丰富食物的愉悦反应。神经素的功能障碍是这种作用的基础，但是恢复其信号会恢复享乐喂养并减少肥胖症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250330/hedonic-eating-fades-with-with-obesitye28094but-neurotensin-helpsin-helps-bring-it-bring-it-back.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250330/hedonic-eating-fades-with-with-obesitye28094but-neurotensin-helpsin-helps-bring-it-bring-it-back.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=860C6B53-27B0-4178-A589-44CE1EDEF0B4 Sun, 30 Mar 2025 20:34:00 -0400 Hedonic eating fades with obesity—but neurotensin helps bring it back
每天吃超级过程的食物会增加老年人的抑郁症风险每天吃四份或更多份超处理的食物会使老年人的抑郁症风险增加10％，并适度降低其与心理健康相关的生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250330/eating-ultra-processed-food-daily-daily-increases-daily-increases-depression-depression-risk-in--inderer-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250330/eating-ultra-processed-food-daily-daily-increases-daily-increases-depression-risk-in--in grod-inderds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=C700315-3C91-43A2-8568-54EA1F8AEE61 Sun, 30 Mar 2025 20:05:00 -0400 Eating ultra-processed food daily increases depression risk in older adults

大脑健康的饮食可以改善您的生活质量吗？这项研究对其进行了测试一项为期12周的可行性试验测试了中年成年人的思维饮食，显示出改善的饮食质量，情绪和身体生活质量，但没有显着认知的增长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250330/can-brain-healthy-eating-eating-improve-your-quallo--fire-fire-fire-life-this this-this-this-this-study-tested-tested-it.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250330/can-brain-healthy-eating-eating-improve-your-quallo------------life-life-this this-this-this-this-this-this-study-tested-it.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c13a972f-771c-4fb2-4fb2-8052-83574e931206 Sun, 30 Mar 2025 18:48:00 -0400 Can brain-healthy eating improve your quality of life? This study tested it
战士试验发现强化疗法对女性心脏事件没有影响根据美国心脏病学学院的研究表明，在患有缺血的迹象和症状的女性中，患有缺血症状和症状的女性五年中，五年中五年中严重的心血管事件发生率并没有显着影响严重的心血管事件的发生率，但根据美国心脏心脏病学院年度科学学院的研究没有障碍，并没有障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/warrior-trial-finds-no-impact-no-impact-of--------------------------------------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/warrior-trial-finds-no-impact-no-impact-of--------------------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70cf7561-2C95-4DF5-9ADF-CDB7FA15E604 Sat, 29 Mar 2025 14:38:00 -0400 WARRIOR trial finds no impact of intensive therapy on heart events in women
Bentracimab在手术和出血事件期间逆转Ticagrelor的抗血小板效应根据美国心脏病学院年度科学学院（ACC25）的一项研究，一种作为对抗血小板剂Ticagrelor的解毒剂而开发的药物，可以安全有效地逆转Ticagrelor的抗血小板效应或经历重度出血的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/bentracimab-reverses-ticagrelors-antiplatelet-effects-diring-during-serighergery-surgery-ander-surgery-and-bleeding-events.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/bentracimab-vreveres-ticagrelors-antiplatelet-effects-effects-dring-serighergery-surgery-andergery-ander-bleeding-events.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c476bb34-d908-4156-894f-6d2668f5c7e8 Sat, 29 Mar 2025 14:26:00 -0400 Bentracimab reverses ticagrelor's antiplatelet effects during surgery and bleeding events
Semaglutide可以改善有症状垫和2型糖尿病患者的最大步行距离Semaglutide是一种类似胰高血糖素的肽1（GLP-1）激动剂，在首个症状试验中，有症状的外周动脉疾病（PAD）和2型糖尿病患者的最大步行距离可显着改善，以评估使用GLP-1激动剂来管理PAD的使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/semaglutide-improves-maximal-walking-distance-in-people-with-------------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/Semaglutide-improves-maximal-walking-distance-in-people-with-symptomatic-PAD-and-Type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id= ed2fee39-4be9-4764-91c7-276ce8d402ba Sat, 29 Mar 2025 14:18:00 -0400 Semaglutide improves maximal walking distance in people with symptomatic PAD and Type 2 diabetes
研究发现4F-PCC在减少心脏手术后降低出血时高于冷冻血浆根据美国心脏病学院年度科学学院（ACC.25）的一项研究，在心脏手术期间患有过度出血的患者中，一种含有蛋白质的浓缩血液产物比冻结血浆更有效，并造成更少的不良反应（标准疗法）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/study-finds-4f-pcc-superior-to-frozen-plasma-plasma-in-reducing-reducing-bleeding--flead- ferter-cardiac-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/study-finds-4f-pcc-superior-to-frozen-plasma-plasma-in-reducing-bleeding-bleeding-flater-ferfter-ferter-cardiac-sugergery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33787E56-B8B3-4544-B9FC-BFC-BF6408F3BC5D Sat, 29 Mar 2025 14:10:00 -0400 Study finds 4F-PCC superior to frozen plasma in reducing bleeding after cardiac surgery
研究揭示了支架植入后双重抗血小板疗法的最佳持续时间植入支架的患者在手术后的几个月内植入了阻塞的冠状动脉会面临双重风险和出血过多的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/research-reveals-eptimal-duration-duration-dul-antiplelet-thiplatelet-therapy-theraphy-therapy-therapy-therapy-ferter-ferter-stent-implantation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250329/research-reveals-eptimal-duration-duration-dual-antiplelet-thipletlet-therapy-therapy-therapy-therapy-theraphy-perter-hefter-Stent-intplantation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=901D02AC-3879-480C-B64A-241EBD4CD1AB Sat, 29 Mar 2025 14:02:00 -0400 Research reveals optimal duration of dual antiplatelet therapy after stent implantation
